definition: Structural parts or assemblies that make up firearms and enable their operation

positive_examples: The gunsmith examined the rifle's chamber for any damage or wear
She gripped the forestock to steady her aim at the shooting range
The revolver's cylinder needed cleaning after the long practice session
He replaced the worn buttstock on his hunting rifle before the season
The muzzle brake helped reduce recoil during rapid fire
The bolt carrier group is a critical component of the AR-15 platform
negative_examples: The ammunition was stored separately from the weapons
He holstered his pistol after clearing the chamber
The shooting range provided ear protection and safety glasses
She purchased a new scope for better long-range accuracy
The gun safe contained multiple firearms and accessories
The cleaning kit included brushes, patches, and solvent
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Ammunition, FirearmAccessories, SafetyEquipment, WeaponOptics, CleaningSupplies
